scripts.build: cp ../libs/GalleryTypes.jsx src && cp ../libs/CartButton.jsx src && cp ../libs/Photo.jsx src && cp ../libs/Loading.jsx src && cp ../libs/NavBar.jsx src && rm -rf dist && npx webpack && cp ./dist/index.bundle.js ../../static/js/gallery.bundle.js
scripts.rebuild: cp ../libs/GalleryTypes.jsx src && cp ../libs/CartButton.jsx src && cp ../libs/Photo.jsx src && cp ../libs/Loading.jsx src && cp ../libs/NavBar.jsx src && rm -rf dist && rm -rf node_modules/ && npm i && npm audit fix && npx webpack && cp ./dist/index.bundle.js ../../static/js/gallery.bundle.js
